title: Kyler Murray Responds
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew discuss Kyler’s surprise press conference, Ryan Jensen being carted off at practice due to a knee injury, Deebo Samuel being at training camp but not practicing, and the QB competition in Pittsburgh. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Kyler Murray's surprise press conference and Ryan Jensen goes down with a knee injury.
